name: Durak for iPad
description:
*Durak is the #1 card/casino game in 13 countries!*

"Durak is a great app that shows just why this game is so popular and a great addition to your collection."
– App Spy

Durak is the world's best card game.

The object of the game is to play all of your cards before your opponents do. The last person holding cards is the Durak – the fool. Like all truly great card games, chance plays a role, but it takes skill and strategy to master the game.

There can be many winners, but only one Durak!


FEATURING:
- Facebook Connect
- Online Multiplayer
- Bluetooth Multiplayer
- Chat
- Buddy List
- Global Leader-board
- Push Notifications
- Nudge Notifications


Follow us on Twitter @losttoken
Like us on Facebook.com/TheBestCardGame
